query: Red Granite Grinder gravel race Athens

videos.title: Red Eagle Gravel Grinder 2023 | Tori's First Gravel Event
videos.description:
Gravel! Been a while since I've made a dedicated gravel video, but given that I got my wife Tori out for the Red Eagle Gravel Grinder, I had to make one. Beautiful day in Geneva, OH at the Red Eagle Distillery. Bikes, Beers, Chili, and Friends... what more could you ask for?

Tori received several compliments on her DeFeet socks. Save yourself some money on your own DeFeet socks and accessories with code: WHITEHAIR15 at https://defeet.com/.

Strava of the ride: https://www.strava.com/activities/9114397625

Follow me: 
Insta: https://www.instagram.com/the_lanky_cyclist/ 
Strava: https://www.strava.com/athletes/800889

#gravel
